Text:
Here is the Windows version:

thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8034886

Any chance to made available the linux version?
thanks in advance
How is this a Mac version? The only executable is a Windows .exe file. The instructions in the description are "Run setup_krz_act_i.exe and install the game", but it's not clear how to do that.

How you managed to get an exe file by downloading this torrent is beyond me. The only files are:

- KentuckyRouteZero_ActI_MAC_complete.dmg
and
- Description.txt

Also, those instructions you mentioned don't appear anywhere. 

Are you sure you donwloaded this torrent and not the one for the Windows version of the game?
Thanks. I must have had one of the other windows up when I got the torrent, and downloaded the wrong one.
